markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Skittertalk](/Feats.aspx?ID=2764) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Anadi" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=255" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Mwangi Expanse](/Sources.aspx?ID=89) pg. 103 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You can ask questions of, receive answers from, and use the [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) skill with spiders and other arachnids. The GM determines which creatures count for this ability.
name: Skittertalk
